comment: Refrain from using words like 'whore' and 'nigger' to express your anger. It's childish and there are better ways to express your words.
amr:
# ::snt Refrain from using words like 'whore' and 'nigger' to express your anger. It's childish and there are better ways to express your words.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :example (a / and
                              :op1 (w2 / whore-01)
                              :op2 (n / nigger)))
                  :ARG2 (e / express-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (a2 / anger-01
                              :ARG1 y))))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (c / childish
                  :domain (ii / it))
            :op2 (w3 / way
                  :manner-of (e2 / express-01
                        :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                        :ARG1 (w4 / word
                              :poss y2))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (g / good-02
                              :ARG1 w3)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / more)))))

comment: Calm yourself. Not even sure that entire tirade made sense...
amr:
# ::snt Calm yourself. Not even sure that entire tirade made sense...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / calm-03
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 y)
      :snt2 (s / sure-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (s2 / sense-02
                  :ARG1 (t / tirade
                        :mod (e / entire)))
            :mod (e2 / even)))
